summary: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.
cast: Jack Buetel|Jane Russell|Thomas Mitchell|Walter Huston|Mimi Aguglia|Joe Sawyer|Gene Rizzi|Bobby Callahan|Martin Garralaga|Ben Johnson|Dickie Jones|Cecil Kellogg|Ethan Laidlaw|Ted Mapes|William Newell|Emory Parnell|Edward Peil Sr.|Wallace Reid Jr.|Julian Rivero|Lee Shumway|William Steele|Harry Strang|Frank Ward|Pat West
keywords: big breasts|gunfighter|new mexico territory|apache territory|apache indian
title: El forajido
